plot: A deliciously dark comedy. Two street smart zombies, Kenny and Chip, are engaged in a heated foot race with no rules and anything goes as they compete for a tasty old man out for a late night stroll.
title: Easy Prey
plot_es: A deliciously dark comedy. Two street smart zombies, Kenny and Chip, are engaged in a heated foot race with no rules and anything goes as they compete for a tasty old man out for a late night stroll.
plot_en: A deliciously dark comedy. Two street smart zombies, Kenny and Chip, are engaged in a heated foot race with no rules and anything goes as they compete for a tasty old man out for a late night stroll.
